Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin OBrien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Ancient titans Godzilla and Kong clash in an epic battle against an undiscovered threat hidden within the Earth. Director Adam Wingards blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens and Brian Tyree Henry

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: A ruthless warlord resolves to rid the desert of its few remaining tribes, prompting them to seek the help of a legendary assassin to end the despots reign of terror by destroying his source of power - a beautiful but deadly sorceress. Fantasy action adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Steven Brand, Kelly Hu and Michael Clarke Duncan

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Daredevil explorers Rick and Evelyn OConnell are called into action when their son accidentally resurrects the evil Chinese Emperor Han from his ancient tomb. The family now faces a race against time to prevent the merciless leader from awakening his vast terracotta army in a plot to take over the world. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Maria Bello, Jet Li and Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist sets out to find his estranged father, who has gone missing while searching for the Holy Grail. Once reunited, the duo team up to finish the task and locate the sacred relic before the Nazis get their hands on it. Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: The globe-trotting archaeologist teams up with a rebellious teenager who draws him into a search in the Amazon jungle for a mysterious artefact of untold power. But their quest is hindered by Soviet agents who also want the fabled object for a more sinister purpose. Action adventure sequel, starring Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf, Ray Winstone and John Hurt

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: When accountant Jonathan Mardukas skips bail after having been arrested for embezzlement, bounty hunter Jack Walsh is hired to catch the fraudster and return him from New York to Los Angeles. Unfortunately, his task is hindered by the ingenuity of Mardukas and the attentions of pursuing FBI agents and Mafia hitmen. Comedy thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, Dennis Farina, John Ashton and Joe Pantoliano

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: A battle-hardened special forces operative attempts to rescue his kidnapped niece when a mercenary mission spirals into chaos. Action thriller, starring Eden Brolin, Andy Garcia and Melissa Leo

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: During the 14th century, William Tell defends his family and his homeland of Switzerland after the Austrian King invades. Historical drama, starring Claes Bang, Connor Swindells, Ben Kingsley and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Daredevil explorers Rick and Evelyn OConnell are called into action when their son accidentally resurrects the evil Chinese Emperor Han from his ancient tomb. The family now faces a race against time to prevent the merciless leader from awakening his vast terracotta army in a plot to take over the world. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Maria Bello, Jet Li and Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: The globe-trotting archaeologist teams up with a rebellious teenager who draws him into a search in the Amazon jungle for a mysterious artefact of untold power. But their quest is hindered by Soviet agents who also want the fabled object for a more sinister purpose. Action adventure sequel, starring Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf, Ray Winstone and John Hurt

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious unchartered island in the Pacific, a team of scientists embark on a top-secret mission to the same region. Things soon descend into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming, and they must battle to escape from the domain of the mighty Kong. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Blood For Dust
programme.desc: A travelling salesman drowning under the weight of providing for his family finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague. Action thriller, starring Scoot McNairy, Kit Harington, Josh Lucas and Ethan Suplee

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: The Ogglies
programme.desc: Looking for a new home, the Oggly family end up in the beautiful, peaceful village of Smelliville when Firebottom, the family dragon, crash-lands on a run-down rubbish tip. Unfortunately, Smelliville has a stinky problem - the dump is spoiling the place, and something must be done. Animated family adventure, with the voice of Ben Young

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: A tap-dancing penguin goes searching for his missing son, but his search leads him to discover a drifting iceberg that threatens to destroy his colony. He sets out to unite all the birds in the Antarctic to avert the catastrophe. Animated musical comedy sequel, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Ava Acres and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: A young penguin disappoints his fellow seabirds with his inability to sing - but instead he displays a remarkable talent for tap dancing. However, his elders refuse to accept this outlandish behaviour and send the youngster into exile, marking the start of a wonderful journey. Animated adventure, with the voices of Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Heroic flightless birds Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico uncover a plot to take over the world. Needing help to foil the evil scheme, they seek out a secret society of animal agents, led by a heroic wolf. Animated comedy spin-off, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich and Tom McGrath

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A spoiled, selfish cat carelessly loses his ninth life, but winds up being reincarnated as a different animal in each of his next lives. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mo Gilligan, Simone Ashley and Sophie Okonedo

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his towns weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: A scientist believes he has saved the world from his invention, a machine that accidentally turned water into food. However, he learns the device is still active and has created a race of food/animal hybrids that he must stop from running wild across the world. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the counts daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his sons tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Flummels are an extinct species of rabbit-like creatures with holes in their centre. One day two of the fluffy animals find themselves transported from 1835 to modern day Shanghai. Animated adventure from the makers of The Simpsons Movie, featuring the voices of Adam Devine, Rachel Bloom and Ken Jeong

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold, a pair of elementary school pranksters, inadvertently transform their mean-spirited principal into a daring vigilante. Cartoon adventure based on the best-selling series of books, featuring the voices of Kevin Hart, Thomas Middleditch and Ed Helms

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League vs Bizarro League
programme.desc: Animated action-adventure, with the voices of Diedrich Bader and Nolan North. Superman and the Justice League team up with their Bizarro League counterparts to thwart Darkseids attempt to conquer the galaxy

programme.title: The Inseparables
programme.desc: A puppet and an abandoned stuffed animal toy cross paths in Central Park and pair up for an epic adventure in New York City. Animated adventure, with the voices of Monica Young and Danny Fehsenfeld

programme.title: Dr Seuss The Lorax
programme.desc: A boy leaves his urban home in search of a real tree, and meets the reclusive industrialist who first created the city. The hermit tells the story of a grumpy forest creature who tried to stop him destroying the trees, and inspires the youngster to undo the damage that has been done. Animated fantasy based on the childrens book, with the voices of Danny DeVito, Zac Efron and Ed Helms

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: A leaky boat leaves the precocious youngsters stranded on a jungle island, but their luck changes when explorers the Wild Thornberrys come to their rescue. However, Thornberry dad Nigel loses his memory, so it falls to his daughter Eliza to save the day. Childrens animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his towns weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: A scientist believes he has saved the world from his invention, a machine that accidentally turned water into food. However, he learns the device is still active and has created a race of food/animal hybrids that he must stop from running wild across the world. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: Ambitious fish Oscar dreams of escaping his humdrum undersea life. His wish comes true when a gangster shark keen to escape a world of organised crime seeks his help in faking his own death. But Oscar soon finds himself out of his depth as his fearsome reputation gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Smith, Robert De Niro, Martin Scorsese, Renee Zellweger, Angelina Jolie and Jack Black

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: Five years after events of the first film, teenager Finn has rebuilt Bricksburg into a post-apocalyptic wasteland. When Emmet is plagued by a vision of an impending cataclysm, he and Lucy fight to protect their beloved city from invaders. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Chris Pratt, Elizabeth Banks and Will Arnett

programme.title: Bon Voyage, Charlie Brown (and Dont Come Back!)
programme.desc: Animated adventure as Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the rest of the Peanuts gang visit England and France on an exchange trip - but the perpetually worried youngster is concerned by a mysterious letter. With the voices of Arrin Skelley, Laura Planting, Daniel Anderson and Casey Carlson

programme.title: Piece By Piece
programme.desc: Pharrell Williams tells the story of his life - through the lens of Lego animation. With an all-star cast, including Kendrick Lamar, Gwen Stefani and Snoop Dogg

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks anniversary celebrations are thwarted by an evil sorcerer searching for a magical orb hidden deep inside their castle. When Derek is lured out of the palace to rescue his kidnapped mother, Odette calls on her band of animal friends for help. Animated fantasy sequel, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Douglas Sills, Jake Williamson and Christy Landers

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in Old West America, two orphans must embark on a cross-country quest aboard a train. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gemma Arterton, Sean Bean and Stephen Graham

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: During the build-up to the first broadcast of Saturday Night Live on October 11th 1975, a group of young comedians and writers prepare to change television forever. Comedy, starring Gabriel LaBelle, Rachel Sennott, Cory Michael Smith and Ella Hunt

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A teenager is surprised when she is befriended by the girls in the most popular clique at her new school. However, a dating mishap leads to trouble and her supposed friends start to turn on her. Urged on by other pals outside their circle, the newcomer resolves to bring down the self-appointed queen of campus - only to end up adopting some of her rivals crueller characteristics. Comedy, with Lindsay Lohan, Rachel McAdams, Tina Fey and Lacey Chabert

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. Musical adaptation of the 2004 cult classic, starring Angourie Rice, Renee Rapp, Aulii Cravalho, and Tina Fey, who also wrote the screenplay

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A washed-up quarterback ends up in jail after a drunken night out, and is ordered by the warden to put together an American football team to take on the guards, with the help of a former college champ. Remake of 1974 comedy The Mean Machine, with Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Nelly and Burt Reynolds, who starred in the original

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: The Cinema List: SNL
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, the Cinema List explores 50 years of films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A veteran lifeguard commands a highly trained team that keeps the sun-kissed resort of Emerald Bay safe. As he breaks in some new recruits - including an insubordinate former Olympic swimmer - he has to contend with a dangerous new drug sweeping the beach. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A teenager is surprised when she is befriended by the girls in the most popular clique at her new school. However, a dating mishap leads to trouble and her supposed friends start to turn on her. Urged on by other pals outside their circle, the newcomer resolves to bring down the self-appointed queen of campus - only to end up adopting some of her rivals crueller characteristics. Comedy, with Lindsay Lohan, Rachel McAdams, Tina Fey and Lacey Chabert

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. Musical adaptation of the 2004 cult classic, starring Angourie Rice, Renee Rapp, Aulii Cravalho, and Tina Fey, who also wrote the screenplay

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An eccentric but brilliant former cop sets himself up to champion the underdog - as a private eye specialising in locating missing animals. The zany detective is called in to find a kidnapped dolphin - the mascot of an American football team - and uncovers a plot involving high-level police corruption. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Courteney Cox, Sean Young, Tone Loc and Noble Willingham

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: Cynical, hard-drinking teacher Elizabeth Halsey hates her job and the kids in her class, and hopes to escape her daily grind by landing a rich husband. A wealthy substitute seems like a suitable candidate, but she has a rival for his attention in a squeaky-clean colleague. Comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Jason Segel and Lucy Punch

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Fast-talking Detroit cop Axel Foley heads for Los Angeles after an old friend is murdered before his eyes. His search for the killers leads him into conflict with a seemingly untouchable drug kingpin, but he also has to contend with the local force, who do not want him taking matters into his own hands. Comedy thriller, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Ronny Cox, John Ashton and Steven Berkoff

programme.title: The Cinema List
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: A conniving bear and his diminutive sidekick learn that the national park they live in is due to be closed down by the greedy local mayor. They must join forces with their old foe, a park ranger who resents their mischief-making, to save the day. Comedy based on the cartoon series, starring Anna Faris and Tom Cavanagh, and featuring the voices of Dan Aykroyd and Justin Timberlake.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: Green-skinned Elphaba Thropp becomes part of the new intake at Shiz University, and shares a room with fellow spell-caster Galinda Upland. Its the beginning of a friendship which culminates in an epic showdown as Elphaba transforms a renegade witch with a skill for bursting into show-stopping songs, like Defying Gravity. Part one of The Wizard of Oz prequel based on the hit stage musical, starring Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande-Butera, Jonathan Bailey, Michelle Yeoh and Jeff Goldblum

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: As a young boy, Willy Wonka inherits a love of chocolate from his mother. When she dies, Willy pursues his dream of opening a chocolate shop in the arcade where confectionery titans Slugworth, Fickelgruber and Prodnose have boutiques. The three entrepreneurs secretly bribe the Chief of Police to thwart Willys ambitions. Co-writer/director Paul Kings fantasy adventure, starring Timothee Chalamet, Calah Lane, Olivia Colman and Hugh Grant

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young heros quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Endes novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: The adventures of the boy who never grows old, as he whisks Wendy Darling and her brothers away to the magical world of Neverland - where they come face to face with fearsome Captain Hook. Adaptation of JM Barries fantasy novel, starring Jeremy Sumpter, Rachel Hurd-Wood, Jason Isaacs and Lynn Redgrave

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical version of the stage play based on Charles Dickens classic tale about a lonely workhouse orphan who ends up on the cold streets of London, where he falls under the wing of petty crook Fagin and his gang of young backstreet thieves. Featuring the iconic songs Food, Glorious Food, Consider Yourself, As Long as He Needs Me and Youve Got to Pick a Pocket or Two. Starring Ron Moody, Mark Lester, Oliver Reed, Jack Wild, Harry Secombe, Shani Wallis and Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Two lookalike youngsters trade places to help resolve each others problems. Childrens comedy, starring Kirstie Alley, Steve Guttenberg and Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Mildred, an 11-year-old girl, finds her world turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, takes her on a wild adventure. Family comedy, starring Elijah Wood and Nell Fisher

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: A conniving bear and his diminutive sidekick learn that the national park they live in is due to be closed down by the greedy local mayor. They must join forces with their old foe, a park ranger who resents their mischief-making, to save the day. Comedy based on the cartoon series, starring Anna Faris and Tom Cavanagh, and featuring the voices of Dan Aykroyd and Justin Timberlake.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Two lookalike youngsters trade places to help resolve each others problems. Childrens comedy, starring Kirstie Alley, Steve Guttenberg and Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: A lonely boy, neglected by his father and bullied at school, finds comfort in a mysterious book about a young heros quest to save his world from destruction. However, as he reads the tale, he begins to become part of the story. Fantasy adventure based on Michael Endes novel, starring Barret Oliver, Noah Hathaway, Gerald McRaney, Moses Gunn and Patricia Hayes

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Mildred, an 11-year-old girl, finds her world turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, takes her on a wild adventure. Family comedy, starring Elijah Wood and Nell Fisher

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaimans novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The discovery of an ancient relic leads the Ghostbusters old and new to join forces to stop a second ice age. Supernatural comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Rudd, Carrie Coon, Mckenna Grace and Finn Wolfhard

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: Two youngsters unwittingly unleash all manner of monsters from a locked manuscript they find in an abandoned house. Comedy sequel, starring Madison Iseman, Jeremy Ray Taylor and Wendy McLendon-Covey

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama based on the life of Peter Pan author JM Barrie. As a young-at-heart playwright, Barrie is uncomfortable with life in the critical spotlight. However, his friendship with four boys and their free-spirited widowed mother brings him the inspiration for his greatest work. Starring Johnny Depp, Kate Winslet, Dustin Hoffman, Julie Christie, Freddie Highmore and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A mysterious gunfighter intervenes when a man and his family are threatened by a predatory cattle baron determined to force every homesteader in the valley off the land. The situation rapidly escalates into violence, while an unspoken attraction develops between the gunman and the settlers wife. Western, starring Alan Ladd, Jack Palance, Van Heflin and Jean Arthur. Based on the novel by Jack Schaefer

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Leans Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: A group of conspirators contracts the Jackal, a professional hitman, to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle of France. The killer starts to put his painstaking plans into action, creating a new identity, establishing his alibi and commissioning a custom-made weapon, while out-foxing the French police at every turn. Fred Zinnemanns adaptation of Fredericks Forsyth thriller, with Edward Fox, Michael Lonsdale, Alan Badel, Tony Britton and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: The Godfather Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michaels story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppolas Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale and Lee Strasberg

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: American zoologist Dian Fossey gives up her comfortable city life to research endangered mountain gorillas in Rwanda. Living among the apes, she develops a close bond with the animals and becomes an expert in how they communicate, while dedicating the rest of her life to protecting gorillas from extinction. Fact-based drama, starring Sigourney Weaver, Bryan Brown, Julie Harris and Iain Cuthbertson

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: A group of conspirators contracts the Jackal, a professional hitman, to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle of France. The killer starts to put his painstaking plans into action, creating a new identity, establishing his alibi and commissioning a custom-made weapon, while out-foxing the French police at every turn. Fred Zinnemanns adaptation of Fredericks Forsyth thriller, with Edward Fox, Michael Lonsdale, Alan Badel, Tony Britton and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Normandy landings, a group of American soldiers scours the battlefields of France in search of a missing infantryman, who has been given compassionate leave to return home because his brothers have been killed in the conflict. Steven Spielbergs Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Tom Hanks, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns, Matt Damon, Barry Pepper and Vin Diesel. It won five Academy Awards, including Best Cinematography, Best Film Editing, and Best Director. The film makers also took home a couple of Baftas for Best Sound and Best Special Effects

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: English nobleman Robin of Locksley returns home from fighting in the Crusades, only to discover that his father has been murdered and his lands seized, while the local people are living in fear under the tyrannical rule of the Sheriff of Nottingham. Branded an outlaw for his defiance, Robin and his Moorish travelling companion go into hiding in the forest, where they recruit a group of bandits to fight for justice, protect the downtrodden, and foil the Sheriffs plan to seize the throne while the king is away at war. Medieval action adventure, starring Kevin Costner, Alan Rickman, Morgan Freeman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Christian Slater and Mike McShane

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones goes in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a biblical artefact of devastating power. His quest leads him to Egypt, where the Nazis are plotting to use the Ark to further Hitlers plans for world domination - aided by Joness deceitful French rival. The first of five big-screen action adventures, starring Harrison Ford as Indy, with Karen Allen, Paul Freeman and John Rhys-Davies

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist, with his young sidekick and a nightclub singer in tow, is stranded in India, where he takes on a mission to recover magical sacred stones from the hands of an evil cult engaged in human sacrifice and child slavery. Steven Spielbergs action adventure, starring Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan and Amrish Puri

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist sets out to find his estranged father, who has gone missing while searching for the Holy Grail. Once reunited, the duo team up to finish the task and locate the sacred relic before the Nazis get their hands on it. Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his familys Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Francis Ford Coppolas crime drama sequel, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach and Bridget Fonda

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: An isolated, misanthropic New York cab driver becomes increasingly disturbed by the corruption he sees all around him. His desperate attempts to make connections with a political campaigner and a teenage prostitute, whom he feels compelled to save, seem doomed to failure, and he is gradually driven towards a brutal act of violence. Martin Scorseses drama, starring Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd and Harvey Keitel

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enter a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmothers house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Michael Douglas.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enter a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmothers house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the counts daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his sons tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling koalas attempt to save his theatre with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates, while the finalists of the contest find that their lives will never be the same again. Animated comedy, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson, John C Reilly, Taron Egerton, Jennifer Saunders and Jennifer Hudson

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: As a young boy, Willy Wonka inherits a love of chocolate from his mother. When she dies, Willy pursues his dream of opening a chocolate shop in the arcade where confectionery titans Slugworth, Fickelgruber and Prodnose have boutiques. The three entrepreneurs secretly bribe the Chief of Police to thwart Willys ambitions. Co-writer/director Paul Kings fantasy adventure, starring Timothee Chalamet, Calah Lane, Olivia Colman and Hugh Grant

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singers home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: The Cinema List: SNL
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, the Cinema List explores 50 years of films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: Sneaks
programme.desc: Ty is a designer trainer who lives a life of luxury and comfort. However, when a shady shoe collector steals his sister, Ty, is forced to venture out into the world, and onto the streets of New York, to rescue her. Animated comedy, with the voices of Anthony Mackie, Keith David and Laurence Fishburne

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: A strangers claim that a couples 15-year-old daughter was switched at birth throws their perfect family into turmoil, unearthing shattering secrets. Drama, starring Sophia Bush, Chris Carmack and Amiah Miller

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Mila Jankovic, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: After a young girl bursts into their home psychiatry practice claiming an entity is feeding on her, Jordan and her clairvoyant mother must find a way to stop the evil. Horror, starring Shawn Ashmore and Ashley Greene

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.desc: A strangers claim that a couples 15-year-old daughter was switched at birth throws their perfect family into turmoil, unearthing shattering secrets. Drama, starring Sophia Bush, Chris Carmack and Amiah Miller

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves central figures in a journey of battles and betrayal. Musical version of the classic tale, starring Clara Rugaard, Jamie Ward, Rebel Wilson and Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final shift, a burned-out paramedic has to train his keen but inexperienced replacement. What begins as a routine night soon descends into a chaotic, citywide odyssey that tests their endurance. Co-writer/director Christopher Leones action comedy, starring Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery and Aimee Carrero

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger
