What begins as a routine night soon descends into a chaotic, citywide odyssey that tests their endurance. Co-writer/director Christopher Leones action comedy, starring Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery and Aimee Carrero

programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: An android is sent to Earth by aliens on a diplomatic mission, and arrives in the middle of the the Jordanian Civil War of 1970. She forms a connection with a British reporter covering the conflict, and through him, hopes to learn to understand humanity. Sci-fi drama, starring Tilda Swinton and Bill Paterson

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Nasa astronauts Kira Foster and Christian Campbell travel to the International Space Station (ISS) on a Soyuz rocket to join American compatriot Commander Gordon Barrett. They will share the orbiting structure with three Russian cosmonauts. When Gordon receives information from Houston of military conflict with the Russians, the Americans are ordered to seize control of the facility. Drama, starring Ariana DeBose, Chris Messina and John Gallagher Jr

programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: When his young daughters beloved companion, an android named Yang, malfunctions, a man called Jake searches for a way to repair him. In the process, Jake discovers the life that has been passing in front of him, reconnecting with his wife and daughter across a distance he didnt know was there. Sci-fi drama, starring Colin Farrell and Jodie Turner-Smith

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045, gamers explore a virtual world in the quest for a deceased tycoons fortune. However, they must also contend with an evil corporation who will stop at nothing to get their hands on the prize. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Ernest Clines novel, starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn, Simon Pegg and Mark Rylance

programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: An android is sent to Earth by aliens on a diplomatic mission, and arrives in the middle of the the Jordanian Civil War of 1970. She forms a connection with a British reporter covering the conflict, and through him, hopes to learn to understand humanity. Sci-fi drama, starring Tilda Swinton and Bill Paterson

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Two astronauts are left stranded in orbit above the Earth when the debris from an exploding satellite destroys their shuttle. Left drifting in space with no way to contact mission control, they begin a perilous journey to reach the safety of a space station before their oxygen supply runs out. Thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: When his young daughters beloved companion, an android named Yang, malfunctions, a man called Jake searches for a way to repair him. In the process, Jake discovers the life that has been passing in front of him, reconnecting with his wife and daughter across a distance he didnt know was there. Sci-fi drama, starring Colin Farrell and Jodie Turner-Smith

programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: An android is sent to Earth by aliens on a diplomatic mission, and arrives in the middle of the the Jordanian Civil War of 1970. She forms a connection with a British reporter covering the conflict, and through him, hopes to learn to understand humanity. Sci-fi drama, starring Tilda Swinton and Bill Paterson

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Nasa astronauts Kira Foster and Christian Campbell travel to the International Space Station (ISS) on a Soyuz rocket to join American compatriot Commander Gordon Barrett. They will share the orbiting structure with three Russian cosmonauts. When Gordon receives information from Houston of military conflict with the Russians, the Americans are ordered to seize control of the facility. Drama, starring Ariana DeBose, Chris Messina and John Gallagher Jr

programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villains
programme.desc: This Halloween, face terror in every form: from the haunted halls of The Shining to the unseen menace of The Invisible Man, this collection delivers horror at its finest

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A chain of bizarre and deadly incidents in several countries leads scientists to the conclusion that the Earths core has stopped spinning. As chaos erupts around the world, experts hatch a plan to halt the destruction and save the human race - but it involves venturing deep below the planets surface to detonate a nuclear bomb. Sci-fi thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci and DJ Qualls

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Two astronauts are left stranded in orbit above the Earth when the debris from an exploding satellite destroys their shuttle. Left drifting in space with no way to contact mission control, they begin a perilous journey to reach the safety of a space station before their oxygen supply runs out. Thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A conspiracy theorists investigation of his wifes death in a nuclear reactor meltdown leads him and his soldier son into an encounter with underground creatures, which go on a deadly rampage across the world. The only hope for the human race may lie with another equally destructive giant monster. Thriller remake, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Bryan Cranston and Ken Watanabe

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriends father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: A fugitive is left for dead by his treacherous followers on a dangerous world full of lethal predators. He lures bounty hunters to the planet in the hope of killing them and stealing their spacecraft, but finds himself forced to work with them against an attack by the monsters at the top of the food chain. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel and Katee Sackhoff

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A chain of bizarre and deadly incidents in several countries leads scientists to the conclusion that the Earths core has stopped spinning. As chaos erupts around the world, experts hatch a plan to halt the destruction and save the human race - but it involves venturing deep below the planets surface to detonate a nuclear bomb. Sci-fi thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci and DJ Qualls

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Successful international smuggler Chris Farraday turns his back on a life of crime to raise a family. However, his brother-in-law crosses a powerful drug lord, who forces Chris to transport billions of dollars of counterfeit money into the US, or his wife and children will be killed. Crime thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Kate Beckinsale, Giovanni Ribisi and Ben Foster

programme.title: Escape from Alcatraz
programme.desc: A cunning convict with a history of making escape attempts is transferred to the notorious high-security island prison off the California coast, from which no one has ever broken out. Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four magicians use their lavish stage shows as cover for a series of seemingly impossible heists, and give away the money they steal to their audiences. An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Andersons historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegass biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderberghs crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A maverick detective vows to catch a racist criminal suspected of murdering an innocent black man. However, the only witness is reluctant to talk, and the killer comes from a very wealthy family, prompting the tough-talking cop to quit the force and bring in the culprit on his own terms. Remake of the blaxploitation thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Christian Bale and Toni Collette

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A farmer in need of money agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train arrives to transport him to jail. Meanwhile, the pair are holed up in a hotel, where his prisoner plays mind games with him - and the villains cohorts are waiting outside ready to engineer an escape. Western adapted from a novel by Elmore Leonard, with Van Heflin, Glenn Ford, Felicia Farr and Leora Dana

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The captain of Russias first nuclear submarine is demoted for expressing fears that the vessel is unfit for commission. However, his anxieties prove well-founded when the reactor malfunctions, creating the possibility of a nuclear explosion the US would mistake for an attack - and potentially triggering a global conflict. Kathryn Bigelows fact-based thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Liam Neeson and Peter Sarsgaard

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: A cynical petty crook is inspired when he sees a freelance camera crew, and decides to go into business filming crime scenes and accidents, then selling the footage to news broadcasters. His determination to stay ahead of the competition leads him down a dark path as his methods become increasingly ruthless. Crime drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo and Bill Paxton

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia, Don Cheadle and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A maverick detective vows to catch a racist criminal suspected of murdering an innocent black man. However, the only witness is reluctant to talk, and the killer comes from a very wealthy family, prompting the tough-talking cop to quit the force and bring in the culprit on his own terms. Remake of the blaxploitation thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Christian Bale and Toni Collette

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Three brothers run an underground bootlegging operation in Depression-era Virginia. However, as their criminal activities become increasingly successful, a corrupt deputy sheriff demands a cut of the profits, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood. Crime drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman and Guy Pearce

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: After his daughter is murdered, a high school coach takes matters into his own hands and hunts down her killers. Action thriller, starring Dermot Mulroney, Jeff Fahey and Mauricio Mendoza

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Up-and-coming actor Vincent Chase prepares to attend the opening of his latest film Head On, and has lunch with three friends to discuss a forthcoming school reunion - but later learns to his dismay that Colin Farrell has beaten him to a plum role. Drama, starring Adrian Grenier

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Vince fumes over the news that Colin Farrell has beaten him to a role in Matterhorn, and nervously waits to see whether the critics will love or hate him in Head On. Adrian Grenier stars

Shoshanna worries about the mutually destructive relationship between Jessa and Jasper and decides to reunite him with his disapproving daughter Dotty, while Marnie attempts to get her gallery career back on track. programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Selina comes down with the flu, and while she takes time away to recover, things quickly start to fall apart. While Gary fusses around the ailing president, the rest of the White House staff do their best to kill her immensely unpopular Families First bill. However, when they enlist the aid of Dan and Amy, it becomes clear they may have made a costly mistake. Political satire, starring Julia Louis-Dreyfus

programme.title: Veep

The revelation means the whole team is hauled before Congress to give evidence on the allegations, and with the pressure firmly on, it is only a matter of time before someone finds themselves becoming a scapegoat. Political satire, starring Julia Louis-Dreyfus

programme.desc: Love is a universal and powerful emotion, but it can also be destructive. This episode focuses on historial acts of love and betrayal. Plus, how the abandonment of Dido by the hero Aeneas paved the way for Rome, how Norse attitudes to sex and marriage were expressed in the burlesque farce the Lay of Thrym and features Medea, who was guilty of the darkest crime of love and passion - the murder of her own children

programme.title: Walking Through History
programme.desc: Tony Robinson takes a four-day trek along the coastline between Plymouth in Devon and Falmouth, learning about the thriving smuggling trade in Cornwall during the late 18th century. The areas tiny secretive harbours, beaches and secluded coves were ideal for illicit imports such as tobacco and brandy, and the business was so huge it threatened the national economy. Along his route, visiting such beauty spots as Lantic Bay and Polperro, he encounters all sorts of reminders of the trade and meets descendants of those involved

programme.title: Bone Detectives: Britains Buried Secrets
programme.desc: Tori Herridge and a team of scientists investigate when the remains of a young woman from the Bronze Age are found during routine roadworks on the A9 in Scotland. In her grave are clues to who she might have been, including a finely made beaker. Does she belong to the so-called Beaker People, who migrated from Europe to Britain more than 4,000 years ago?

programme.title: Rust Valley Restorers
programme.desc: Mike kicks off his fifth year in business with the restoration of a rare 1971 International Scout II, before teaming up with his brothers to find a new home for their late fathers 1964 Mercury motor

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Arundel Castle, in West Sussex, has been the seat of the Dukes of Norfolk and their ancestors for over 850 years, with its fortunes rising and falling with those of the Howard family. A particularly low point occured when Thomas Howard, the fourth Duke of Norfolk, was executed by Elizabeth I for allegedly plotting to marry her rival Mary Queen of Scots. Dan Jones meets a weapons expert, who shows him how Richard FitzAlan, the third Earl of Arundel, would have fought in the 100 Years War. He also meets a social historian, who gives an insight into how Arundel would have prepared for Queen Victorias visit in 1846

programme.title: Witches of Essex
programme.desc: Henry VIIIs law against witches in 1542 led to thousands of women being persecuted and many burned at the stake. New investigative techniques and historical records are to re-examine the fates of women accused of witchcraft during 16th and 17th-century witch trials in Essex. Rylan and Alice Roberts explores the events, lives, and alleged crimes of those accused, often bringing the stories to life through scripted drama and featuring expert testimony from historians and psychologists

programme.title: The Witches of Salem
programme.desc: The hysteria that unfolded during the Salem witch trials, leading to the execution of 20 women in an affluent New England community. Mark Strong narrates a real-life horror story, with young teenage girls tragically accused and convicted by the shadowy adults lurking in the background. The series draws on extensive historical documents and court records to bring this drama to life

programme.title: The Witches of Salem
programme.desc: How paranoia regarding the suprnatural reached fever pitch as the demonic conspiracy terrorising Salem village grew, leaving no one safe. Boston jail filled with suspected witches and those accused faced execution if found guilty. Narrated by Mark Strong

programme.title: The Witches of Salem
programme.desc: The Salem witch trials began with the case against Bridget Bishop, who is quickly found guilty and sentenced to death by hanging. Her death was not enough to quell the hysteria, and five more women were tried and executed within a month. Narrated by Mark Strong

programme.title: The Witches of Salem
programme.desc: The searing, real-life horror story of the mass witch-hunt that enveloped Salem and New England in 1692. The hysteria and panic that overtook the Puritan community of Salem led to the execution of 20 innocent souls. This instlament explains how the trials were suddenly halted when the Massachusetts elite were accused of witchcraft, and Salem had to deal with the aftermath. Narrated by Mark Strong

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa accepts an invitation to join a Wiccan coven - but before she can be initiated, Chief Wiggum arrives and arrests the other members on charges of witchcraft. Meanwhile, Homer befriends local hillbilly Cletus, eager to share his plentiful supply of illegal moonshine liquor

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Danny is in for a surprise when his mum drops by with some news - shes divorcing his father. McGarrett is on hand to protect Grover when a reporter starts asking questions about Chicago, and Chin and Kono try to solve the murder of an estate agent found dead in one of his properties. Melanie Griffith (Working Girl) and Daryl Hannah (Kill Bill) guest star

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Conspiracy theorist Jerry Ortega returns to help the team investigate a triple homicide connected to a downed top-secret Chinese satellite, while Grover takes Dannys mother for a ride. Alex OLoughlin and Scott Caan, with a guest appearance by Jorge Garcia

programme.title: S.W.A.T.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: During a trip to a water park with the family, Grampa bumps into a newspaper columnist who seemingly becomes fascinated with his life and writes a series of stories about him, but Homer becomes suspicious of the journalists motives

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in Springfield
programme.desc: Ratings for Krustys TV show start to fall, so executives bring in co-star Princess Penelope (voiced by Anne Hathaway) to increase its appeal, and romance soon blossoms between the clown and his new sidekick. Elsewhere, Mr Burns cuts costs at the nuclear plant by taking away the staffs free doughnuts

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Holly holds a seminar on ethics, and discovers the Scranton branch is extremely unethical in its business practices. Comedy, starring Steve Carell

programme.title: The Office (US)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Three spooky Halloween tales, in which Bart and Milhouse play tricks with a mysterious watch and Homer takes over as the Grim Reaper, only to discover Marges name is on his list. With the voices of Alias star Jennifer Garner and boxer Oscar De La Hoya

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart and Lisa frighten their family with blood-curdling tales of terror, including a spine-tingling version of Edgar Allan Poes The Raven. With the guest voice of James Earl Jones

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Galapagos
programme.desc: The broadcaster reveals how life has learnt to adapt quickly in the ever-changing volcanic landscape, resulting in species that exist nowhere else in the world. David investigates the driving forces behind their evolution, exploring the appearance and behaviour of remarkable creatures and vegetation including giant whale sharks, marine iguanas and seemingly normal dandelion seeds that grow into plants the size of trees

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A romantic evening at the ice-rink leads to Homer and Marge heading for the Winter Olympics to play for a curling team, while Lisa becomes hopelessly addicted to collecting sporting memorabilia and Bart befriends Canadas equivalent of Milhouse

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Ma Lalo o Ka `Lli (Beneath the Surface)
programme.desc: Danny is struggling to come to terms with his parents split, so he forces a reunion by re-creating their first date. The team unravels a devious kidnapping plot, while conspiracy theorist Jerry is still on the scene, helping McGarrett decipher a code found at the bottom of his Champ box. Tom Berenger and Melanie Griffith guest star

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Chin Ho and Jerry attend a high-school reunion, where one of their old classmates winds up dead. The finger of suspicion soon points as a struggling illusionist, but has he really got blood on his hands? Meanwhile, McGarrett and Danny head to the secret burial site in search of clues

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Three men are shot in the neighbourhood where Hondo used to live and the only witness is the troubled teenage son of his old friend Leroy, who is now behind bars

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride and the team are on the hunt for a kidnapped 14-year-old and discover her father, who will soon have custody, is a radical survivalist living off the grid. Crime drama, starring Scott Bakula

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Miss Hoover asks her students to research their family history, Lisa is distressed to discover that most of her forebears seem to have been crooks and deadbeats. Then she finds an old diary in the attic that was written by her ancestor, Eliza Simpson, and describes a remarkable 19th-century adventure

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mrs Krabappel writes to Barts parents about his bad behaviour when he fails to hand in his homework. After a conference with Principal Skinner, Homer insists on punishing his son, but Marge is more sympathetic, inspiring a scheming Bart to start pitting them against each other

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: On the night of Michaels third date with Holly, the company is burgled, so he organises an auction to replace the stolen goods

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael helps Holly move house following her transfer to Nashua in New Hampshire, and Pam discovers people at Corporate are less excited about Halloween than she is

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart, Homer and Lisa eat too many sweets and suffer from nightmares on the most spooky night of the year - Halloween. Lisa accidentally leaves the world defenceless from an alien invasion, Barts Village of the Damned-style mind power turns his dad into a jack-in-the-box and Homer becomes Mr Burnss robot. Featuring the guest voice of James Earl Jones

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Another trio of spirited Halloween tales. Board games from bygone eras wage war against Springfield, Homer and Marge spend their second honeymoon adrift in the Pacific Ocean, and a mysterious fanged student woos Lisa. With the guest voices of Daniel Radcliffe and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.sub-title: James May, Billy Porter, Emma Barnett
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan invites nine artists to paint celebrity sitters James May, Billy Porter and Emma Barnett as Tai Shan Schierenberg, Kathleen Soriano and Kate Bryan judge the efforts

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An assassin faces a race against time when he learns a rival has poisoned him with a drug that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. As he sets out to take revenge on his enemies, he has to resort to increasingly desperate acts to keep his adrenaline pumping. Action thriller, with Jason Statham, Amy Smart and Jose Pablo Cantillo

programme.title: An Idiot Abroad
programme.desc: Ricky Gervais sends Karl Pilkington on another world trip - and this time he has company in the shape of film and TV star Warwick Davis. The odd couple follow in the footsteps of legendary explorer Marco Polo from Italy to China, and while Karl offers his usual pearls of wisdom, Lifes Too Short actor Warwick samples the foreign climes from his own unique perspective. They begin their 5,000-mile journey in Venice, where they attend a masked ball, enter the inaccurately named Pleasure Machine and test-ride a jet pack

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: An emergency dash results in a serious collision between the police van and a taxi. Plus, officers race to save a man threatening to kill himself

programme.title: Fíorsceal
programme.desc: Documentary following the Pygmy peoples. In the forests of six central African countries are the Little People, a collective of indigenous hunter-gatherer tribes that live a life in harmony with the forests ecosystem. This film captures the unique rites and traditions of their communal life within the jungle. As ultimate specialists of their environment and holders of an immense ancestral knowledge of forest ecology, the Pygmies have an essential role to play in the future of this invaluable forest heritage

programme.title: Contractors
programme.desc: Work continues for Shane on the new dairy farm in Meath, while Alans new recruits from New Zealand arrive in Cork. programme.title: Ó Mhuir go Tír

programme.desc: Two and half years after Danish Prime Minister Birgitte Nyborg called a general election, she has left the political arena and is now a globally demanded public speaker. However, it pains her to see how her old party, the Moderates, have changed course, so she offers Katrine Fonsmark a job as her press secretary, and together with Bent Sejro, starts to plan a comeback. programme.title: Scealta Grá na hÉireann
programme.sub-title: Gráinne Ní Mháille and Risteárd an Iarainn
programme.desc: An epic love story that takes place during a time of great change and upheaval in 16th-century Gaelic Ireland. Grace OMalley forged a path to power and leadership by land and by sea in the west of Ireland with her husband, Richard in Iron Bourke. Their castle, Rockfleet, still stands today on the Northern shore of Clew Bay, a testament to the exploits of Irelands Pirate Queen and her great love, Richard in Iron

programme.title: Aussie Road Train Truckers
programme.desc: Documentary series following a cast of Australian road train drivers as they haul cargo across the Outback - the drivers are often away from their families for weeks at a time chasing contracts along some of the world’s longest roads. The drivers all have highly specialised road skills and knowledge of the local environment - with their trailers in tow, they battle unforgiving terrain and weather conditions to deliver food, cattle and construction supplies to those who need it the most.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson puts the Renaultsport Twingo 133 through a stringent examination in Belfast - with a helping hand from actor Ross Kemp. Richard Hammond samples the delights of racing airport vehicles and James May takes the Vauxhall Insignia VXR for a drive in the company of Margaret Calvert, whose ideas were central to the design of modern British road signs. Film director Guy Ritchie is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car, and there is also a group test of high-performance off-roaders from BMW, Audi and Range Rover

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May bid to prove that cars can be art by filling a gallery in Middlesbrough with motoring-related works, including a few creations of their own. They also resort to unusual promotional techniques to attract more visitors to their exhibition. Back on the track, Jeremy tests British supercar the Noble M600. Jenson Button drives the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers Chicken and Egg
programme.desc: Dave and Si travel to Israel, where they visit the 2500-year-old remains of the worlds first chicken farm, as well as getting a glimpse of the future for poultry. They prepare a shakshuka on a beach in Tel Aviv and chicken shawarma kebabs on the streets of Old Jerusalem. Finally, they make their own version of chicken schnitzel, a Middle Eastern dish with European roots

programme.title: Rick Steins Road to Mexico

Once again, stand-up and improvisation are the name of the game as the contestants try to get one up on one another

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.sub-title: Would I Lie to You? The Unseen Bits
programme.desc: Rob Brydon, Lee Mack and David Mitchell feature in a special episode of out-takes, looking back over some of the best moments. Among the celebrity guests are Kevin Bishop, Warwick Davis, Romesh Ranganathan, Hugh Dennis, Sara Cox and Brian Blessed

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Writer Charlie Brooker, Professor Hannah Fry, musician Danny Jones and comedian and author Shaparak Khorsandi join host Rob Brydon and regular captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the offbeat panel show. As usual, the participants set out to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible fibs about themselves in a bid to secure a team victory, through rounds such as Home Truths and Quick-fire Lies

programme.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life Is Goodish
programme.desc: Dave Gorman performs a series of witty stand-up jokes about the digital footprints people leave behind when surfing the internet

programme.title: Doctors

programme.title: Casualty
programme.sub-title: Is She Really Going Out with Him?
programme.desc: A barbecue ends in a fight, leaving a man suffering a stroke and a pregnant woman with burns - but the violence does not stop there, and Maggie finds herself dragged into the conflict. Kelsey is thrilled at the prospect of seeing her soldier suitor James, Dixie shares her suspicions about Zana, and Toby is caught in bed with Joanne. Keith Barron, Richard Hawley and Madeline Fairley guest star

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part series finale, a 14-year-old dies in Smithys arms following a stabbing incident, and CCTV footage reveals he had been acting as a mule for the older members of a gang. One of Mickeys informants is spotted at the crime scene and eventually gives vital evidence pointing to the most likely culprit, but the detective fears for her safety when she is released on bail and returns to the estate

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: As the residents of Walford prepare a memorial service for Garry, Dawn is finally forced to confront her true feelings for him. Ians romantic evening takes a surprising turn

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Dawns world is shaken by an ultimatum from a surprising source, while some racy secrets are revealed at the book club. Meanwhile, superdad Ricky tries to control Biancas kids

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: Joy plans a party for the girls while the men are on their training exercise at the Army training ground. Meanwhile, Dave Tucker opens up about feeling depressed

programme.title: Monarch of the Glen

Richard Briers, Alastair Mackenzie and Susan Hampshire star

programme.title: Londons Burning
programme.desc: The fire-fighting team faces a race against time as it struggles to save a girl trapped in a silo. Meanwhile, Bayleaf is sent up a crane to talk a suicidal boy down

programme.title: The Upper Hand
programme.desc: Caroline disapproves of Charlies attitude towards the childrens fighting, but a traumatic day in which Tom also gets into trouble forces her to eat her words. Comedy, starring Joe McGann and Diana Weston

Meanwhile, a misunderstanding over a neck injury puts the police on Alvin and Entwistles trail

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Nobody Messes with Tony the Throat
programme.desc: Hobbo, Alvin and Entwistle set out to save the day when Howard suspects Pearl is seeing someone else and the trio soon draw up a surveillance operation that leads them to a seedy bikers club. Toby sets out to find Aunty Wainwright when he has ironing problems

programme.title: Harry Wild
programme.sub-title: Samurai Plague Doctor Kills for Kicks
programme.desc: Harry and Fergus are approached by a woman desperate to find out how her husband died and although they are reluctant to get involved, their interest is soon piqued. They discover gamblers are running a snuff game in Dublin and Harry turns over the evidence they uncover to Charlie, vowing to stay out of it, but the killers have other ideas

programme.title: Annika
programme.desc: When a body is found on a boat in the Clyde, the case takes the team to the Isle of Bute. Evidence points to a jilted lover, but a darker secret emerges as the team investigate. Crime drama, starring Nicola Walker, Jamie Sives and Katie Leung

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: A Home Office pathologist joins the team to help discover the identity of a dead girl found in woodland in 1987. The detectives trace her origins back to the Highlands of Scotland, uncovering evidence of syphilis and a possible connection with local aristocrat Lady Deeley. Meanwhile, Lane confronts his fears by revisiting the crime scene. Detective drama, guest starring Timothy West and Jane Asher

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: Following Lucass shocking revelations about his former life and double identity, Harry instructs the team to find him - at any cost. He enlists the help of a former internal affairs specialist to track down the fugitive, who is becoming increasingly desperate to locate the Albany file and flee the country with Maya. When Harry discovers Ruth has been placed in grave danger, he faces a tough decision that culminates in a showdown with Lucas

programme.title: Lovejoy
programme.desc: An antique Berber rug spells intrigue for the roguish dealer, leading him into a world of unrequited love and umbrella stands. Meanwhile, Lady Jane splits from her husband after refusing to accompany him to Hong Kong for his new job. Virginia McKenna guest stars

Medical drama, starring Jan Pearson and Tina Hobley

programme.title: Casualty
programme.sub-title: They May Not Mean to But They Do

Kelsey is devastated when Big Mac ends his charade with an e-mail informing her the soldier has died. The man who attacked Jo is brought into the MIU

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part series finale, bringing to an end Britains longest-running police procedural drama, which has been broadcast in 55 countries. The show, which began life as one-off drama Woodentop in 1984, broke new ground by exploring the lives and loves of the officers of the fictional London station of Sun Hill. Callum finally proves himself to Smithy as they hunt the members of the Parkway Crew responsible for the death of Liam Martin, and Mickey goes all-out to get justice for his informant Jasmine Harris following the gang rape

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Tanya is sentenced, while Ricky and Bianca deal with the life-changing results of Tiffanys paternity test, which is not the only news to rock their family

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Trouble looms for Lucas as his dirty secret threatens to reveal itself, Ricky and Bianca face a new Whitney-related dilemma, and the Masoods are hit by a financial crisis

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: In the final episode, the fusiliers attend the funeral of Tony Wilton. Elsewhere, Donna decides that it is time to move out

programme.desc: After suffering a brush with Stella, Hobbo comes to the conclusion that it is time to find her a man - and, with the help of Clegg and Truly, he decides that eligible village heart-throb Norris Fairburn is the right match. Pearls new-found passion for motorcycling causes trouble for Howard and Marina

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Will Randolph Make a Good Impression?

programme.desc: A car in which a teacher was murdered five years earlier is returned to its owner - the victims husband. Pullman reopens the unsolved case, hoping to track down the dead womans secret lover, who is known to have had a small tattoo - a clue that eventually leads to a male prostitute. Detective drama, starring Amanda Redman, James Bolam, Dennis Waterman and Alun Armstrong

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: The team is reeling from Lucass betrayal, with acting leader Erin Watts keeping things ticking over while Harry is under disciplinary action. But following a tribunal, the head of Section D is quickly back on the Grid, in time to investigate the assassination of a retired spy he worked with in Berlin during the Cold War. Meanwhile, a Russian minister has arrived in London to negotiate a ground-breaking strategic partnership with the UK - and it seems he is the next target for the killer. Peter Firth heads the cast in the final run of the acclaimed spy drama, co-starring Lara Pulver, Geoffrey Streatfeild, Jonathan Hyde, Alice Krige and Simon Russell Beale

programme.title: Lovejoy
programme.desc: The Rev Harry Nettles bets the antiques dealer that a field next to a church contains a Roman mosaic. Drama, guest starring David Kossoff, with Ian McShane and Dudley Sutton

programme.desc: Tom tries to market his garden produce, but finds it more difficult than he imagined - especially with the added pressure of paying the household rates. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal. First broadcast in 1975

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee feels stressed after agreeing to give Kate driving lessons, so she suggests he try yoga to calm his nerves. However, his technique leaves a lot to be desired. Comedy, starring Lee Mack and Megan Dodds

programme.title: Inside No 9
programme.desc: Alan arrives at a small village primary school in rural Wales, and throwing himself into his new job, he still finds himself overshadowed by his much-loved predecessor, Mr King. Starring Steve Pemberton and Reece Shearsmith

programme.title: Toast of London
programme.desc: Stevens new girlfriend, the aristocratic Portia de Coogan, thinks its about time he met her father, Lord Fotheringham, and to make a good first impression, its vital the actor tries to improve his sense of humour. Meanwhile, some voiceover work for the Royal Navy leads to a terrifying visit to the launch of a submarine. Comedy, starring Matt Berry

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: Jones buys a load of black-market pigeons from wheeler-dealer Walker - but is horrified to discover the unfortunate birds were taken from Trafalgar Square. Classic comedy, starring Clive Dunn and James Beck. First broadcast in October 1972

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Nick Knowles Big House Clearout
programme.desc: The presenter helps more families who are being crushed by their clutter. He begins in Portsmouth, where three generations are squeezed together in a three-bed semi thats bursting at the seams in an extraordinary challenge full of emotion and memories. When Sarahs husband Trevor suddenly passed away, she had to return from Dubai to her old house - in which her daughter Stevie and five-year-old grand-daughter were living. Coping with grief, Sarah was unable to face sorting through a lifetime of belongings, so for a year, the house has been totally packed with clutter from the attic to the outhouses, and its become the way they live

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: A couple need space for four kids, including a son with accessibility needs. Drew and Jonathan transform their home to give them their best Christmas yet

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: Marcie is an Air Force veteran and cancer survivor looking for a fresh start for her and her daughters. Drew and Jonathan create a special space for this inspirational mum

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team return to Veterans Street in Manchester, where, in 2015, with the help of Prince William and Prince Harry, DIY SOS launched their most ambitious project yet - transforming a derelict street into a vibrant community for veterans and local people. This time they build the final home for decorated former soldier and single dad Simon Flores, whose foot was blown off by a roadside bomb during a patrol in Iraq

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team travel to Hessle, near Hull in East Yorkshire, to transform the home of Darren Hudson, who was left paralysed from the waist down due to a spinal cord injury. After three months of hospital rehabilitation, Darren returned home to his family, but tragedy struck again eight days later when his wife Sarah died suddenly. Since that moment, Darren and his three sons have been living in emotional trauma, with the wheelchair-using dad now the main carer for the family

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles meets 47-year-old Stuart in Torquay, who has progressive multiple sclerosis. Despite being six foot seven, he sleeps in a chair in the living room. His primary carer is his 73-year-old mother, Grandma Lin, who is completely blind, and walks across town every day to see to her son and her granddaughter Laurens needs. Can the crack team of builders, plasterers and electricians help turn their lives around?

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Previous winners Julie Goodwin and Nat Thaipun return to the kitchen for a two-round elimination that will determine this years Top Five

programme.title: Simply Nigella
programme.desc: The food writer demonstrates her favourite recipes for sharing with family and friends, including a tray of nourishing breakfast bars, a supper of crunchy chicken cutlets, and a dark and sumptuous chocolate cake. Plus she shows to make succulent belly pork burgers, which were inspired by a visit to a New York eatery

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Cameras follow thrill seeker 37-year-old Gareth and 32-year-old Jenny, who are focusing on their new adventure into parenthood, after Gareth was diagnosed with the life-limiting illness multiple sclerosis just 18 months into their relationship. Meanwhile, 28-year-old Tina and 32-year-old Alan are desperate to experience a natural birth for the first time, and 35-year-old Terry tries to cope as his partner Mel goes into labour with their second child, after the unexpected loss of their first

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Some worrying news about their unborn baby puts 34-year-old beautician Maria and builder Davids lives on hold. Cameras also follow 26-year-old doctor Ruby and her partner Colin, whose opposing personalities were put to the test when she suffered with post-natal depression after the birth of their first child. As they await the arrival of their second child, it remains to be seen whether Rubys hard working ethos or Colins jokey ways will help them get through. Plus, 34-year-old Gary and his partner Louises third baby is on the way

programme.title: Bad Girls Behind Bars
programme.desc: When travelling musician and drug user Carmen goes into multiple seizures, officers call a Code Blue emergency as staff and paramedics scramble to respond

programme.title: Bad Girls Behind Bars
programme.desc: The segregation pod of Western Massachusetts Regional Womens Correctional Centre houses the most violent inmates. When one of them attacks an officer, it takes all available staff to restrain her, and Sergeant Clayton begins an investigation into the reasons for the assault. Two prisoners who have been separated conduct a secret relationship, and a Satanist struggles to practice her religion behind bars

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: The two finalists go head to head, each taking on the redesign of a trendy bar in Londons vibrant Soho district. They have three days to make over the ground-floor bar and an intimate basement cocktail lounge - and to help, both contestants have a fellow team-mate, plus a team of trades. One designer goes all-out, relocating the bar to the other side of the room - but the more they rip out, the more it becomes a demolition zone. Down the road, there is indecision and angst as the other finalist realises just how much is at stake. Who will win the career-defining contract to design an upmarket apartment on the Cornish coast?

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Paramedics in Stoke respond to a call about a man who has collapsed with severe breathlessness, while in Dudley, crews treat a woman with a host of complex medical issues

programme.title: Nick Knowles Big House Clearout
programme.desc: The presenter heads to the former mill town of Bolton in Greater Manchester to meet a family in a four-bedroom semi overwhelmed by clutter. Nicks team empty their home and transfer 195 boxes of possessions to the Albert Halls in Bolton before creating a sensational makeover

programme.desc: With their kids getting older and the familys needs changing, Drew and Jonathan transform Holly and Corys kitchen, dining room, family room and music room

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
programme.desc: A retired Air Force nurse lives with her youngest daughter, and their house needs an update. Drew and Jonathan create a fresh, beautiful family home

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team travel to Plymouth to meet the Morfey family, who sold their multi-level home and bought an old wrought-iron forge with the intention of renovating it for their two eldest sons, who have cerebral palsy. But when their daughter got leukaemia and moved miles away for treatment, supported by mum Tara, the family was torn apart. Now the house remains half-built, with no kitchen, hot water or living space. What the Morfeys need is a little help to bring the family back together

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: This time, Nick Knowles and the team transforms a home in Bromsgrove. Karis, a 28-year-old woman who has cerebral palsy, currently lives with her mother, Karen, but now her own health is deteriorating and it is making caring for Karis almost impossible. The family have decided that Karis should move in with her older sister Jo, but her entire home is inaccessible for Karis, so the team decides to build a large two-storey extension to make the house more suitable. Elsewhere, Billy takes on jousting at Warwick Castle

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: The team transforms a home in Bolton, Lancashire for the Taylor-Mann family, making the house more suitable for nine-year-old William, who has severe autism. Williamss condition means that he is extremely hypersensitive to noise, and being in close proximity to his siblings is often just too much for him to bear. Nick Knowles and the team, with the help of kind volunteers, transform the property to create a quiet, calm space that can help William feel as comfortable as possible

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The contestants must work with a personalised Mystery Box full of ingredients they hand-picked earlier in the competition

programme.title: The Secret World of Posh Pets
programme.desc: Peoples high-end pampering of their pets, detailing the extent to which some wealthy individuals indulge their much-loved and respected animals. The first episode features millionaires Debi and Bob, who share their four-acre Kent estate with 13 of the most spoilt dogs in Britain. Debi has arranging for Honey, her teacup Chihuahua to marry long-time partner, Chihuahua-cross Joey, in an extravagant £4,000 wedding. Cameras also catch up with dog portrait artist Robert Clarke, whose clients are charged a £5,000 fee for his services

programme.title: The Secret World of Posh Pets
programme.desc: In Doncaster, South Yorkshire, Bryn sets out to breed over £2million-worth of falcons to sell to the super-rich Sheikhs and princes of the Middle East. High-earning city boy Zane sets out on a Bengal cat-breeding adventure, producing £1,000 kittens then reinvesting the proceeds in a super-rare domestic black panther. Meanwhile, having spent £4,000 on catering, dresses and miniature horse drawn carriages, Debbie can witness her Chihuahuas Honey and Joey tying the knot, in what is surely the doggy wedding of the year

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Childhood best friends Karra and Danny realise their deep friendship has helped them cope and given them a positive outlook on life as they await the arrival of their third child. Meanwhile, Cathryn and Deans friendship has taken an unexpected twist, six years after meeting at a fracture clinic, and Mandy and Melvyn, who were born deaf, hope their second child will be able to hear like their first

programme.title: Pete Wicks: For Dogs Sake
programme.desc: Strictly Come Dancing and TOWIE star Pete Wicks immerses himself in the heart-warming and emotional world of dog care at Basildons Dogs Trust rehoming centre. Pete returns to Dogs Trust, facing a suitcase of abandoned pups on day one and falling hard for Theo, a gentle Italian Mastiff with a serious heart condition.

programme.title: Bad Girls Behind Bars
programme.desc: Suspected of being in a romantic relationship, Lo and Kayla are still being kept apart by officers - and Lo has a difficult decision to make. When jail veterans Jackie and Kourtney are moved, they bring with them all the latest news. Detox over, heroin addict Natasha is moved into the jails general population. Used to living with her mother, how she will cope when thrown into an eight-person tank remains to be seen

programme.title: Bad Girls Behind Bars
programme.desc: The longest-serving inmate in Western Massachusetts Regional Womens Correctional Centre faces another 11 years in prison for manslaughter, and struggles to come to terms with what she has done. A stripper convicted of ID fraud who gave birth in prison tries to turn her life around with a training programme, and a violent prisoner is being moved out of segregation and into a shared tank with seven others

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: Ten aspiring designers compete to get their big break in the world of commercial interior design. For their first challenge, head judge Michelle Ogundehin asks them to transform five upmarket rental apartments in Manchester. Working in pairs, the designers must take on a living room or master bedroom, and then work together on a shared home office

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Janine and Adam assist a woman who is threatening to jump out of a first-floor window, and husband and wife team Ann and Kevin are called out to help Anns sick Dad

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels through Milwaukee, a city on the shore of Lake Michigan, where he learns about the history of the iconic American Harley Davidson motorcycle. When Michael reaches the city of Illinois, he discovers how the modern day skyline of Chicago has replaced a largely wooden city which was destroyed by a great fire many years ago

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo makes his way from Chicago to Champaign, Illinois. On his travels he discovers the origins of the Sanitary and Ship Canal, joins the head chef at Palmer House Hotel to recreate the original chocolate brownie, and visits the Frank Lloyd Wright-designed house that changed the face of American architecture

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek travels to the Lancashire coast to pick up a rare 1972 Citroen SM, and Dave is on HQ duties and admires a Punto thats two decades old but has just 42 miles on the clock

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek is on the road to pick up a funky little Nissan Figaro and a sublime Ferrari 250 GT tribute car, and Paul gets to try out his spanking new Scania T Cab

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: One of the largest Nazi bunkers ever constructed, outside the French town of Watten, a missile facility with storage for 108 missiles, a liquid oxygen factory and two launch pads

programme.title: Nazi Hunters
programme.desc: How Second World War criminal Adolf Eichmann was tracked down to Buenos Aires, Argentina, in 1961

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the show from Broughton Castle in Oxfordshire, where items brought in for valuation include two 18th-century paintings depicting the houses servants and a Chinese-made silver mug. Plus, the story of a pilot who is believed to have flown Britains first scheduled air service before becoming one of the first recruits to the Royal Flying Corps

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the show from Baddesley Clinton, a moated manor house near Birmingham. Items brought in to be valued include a diamond bracelet once worn by Rita Hayworth, a wooden peg that was removed from a childs eye in the 1870s, a painting by Lord Mountbatten of his family home and a controversial carving of St George that offended a churchs parishioners. One visitor brings in a rare wooden pedestal, and is chastised by one of the Roadshow experts for stripping it of the original paintwork

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A 1970 Excalibur Roadstar, once owned by Roy Orbison, arrives at Thornton-le-Dale and Derek heads to County Durham to collect a 1935 Austin 7 Ulster

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Two iconic classics find their way to the Mathewsons auction room. Dave heads to north Manchester to pick up an Austin A30 and a Morris 8E thats had an alternative paint job

programme.title: Operation Arctic
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan visits Churchill, Manitoba, a Canadian town where humans live in close proximity to polar bears. For two months of every year, the animals gather in the area, waiting for sea ice to form so they can head north for their winter hunt. Gordon meets local police officers and refuse collectors who have to work in close proximity to the bears and meets a woman who was mauled on the towns main street

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: British car enthusiasts Will and Gus lay their hands on a potentially very valuable Volvo. Its great to look at, but doesnt start easily and cannot stop, requiring an overhaul of the ignition and breaks

programme.desc: Derek points the team towards one of his favourite motors - a 1983 Daimler Double Six. And a Triumph 2000 is given a modern day makeover under the bonnet

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo stops at Mattoon, Illinois, where he gets a taste of the early life that shaped President Abraham Lincoln, though struggles to split one rail compared with Lincolns estimated 700 a day. The political pundit then heads to Kentucky, where a bloody conflict proved decisive in victory for Lincolns Union. Aboard a paddle steamer on the lower Mississippi, Michael hears about the life of former river boat captain Samuel Clemens, better known as Mark Twain, and in Memphis, Tennessee, uncovers the story of a devastating epidemic. In the home of the Blues, Michael joins some Elvis fans at Graceland

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Reno, Nevada to Californias Napa County, taking to the skies over the Sierra Nevada mountain range and trying his hand at cowboy dressage

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek checks out an abandoned 1985 Renault 4 and an MGB Roadster that hasnt seen the light of day for 36 years, and Jack heads to Rotherham to pick up a pair of rare Bond Bugs.

programme.desc: In the 100th episode, Derek heads to Northumberland to collect a rare 1975 NSU RO 80, Jack deals with a Mini Mayfair stuck in a barn, and an Aston Martin DBS husk is auctioned

programme.sub-title: Dag Bromberg: A City in the Forest
programme.desc: As the Red Army approached a forest in Poland toward the end of the war, they stumbled upon a massive complex containing more than a thousand structures across 25sqkm

programme.title: Nazi Hunters
programme.desc: The hunt for Gestapo head Klaus Barbie and death camp guard John Demjanjuk, dubbed The Butcher of Lyon and Ivan the Terrible respectively, which lasted into the 1980s

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the second of two episodes from Bolsover Castle in Derbyshire. Items brought in to be valued include a painting by DH Lawrence, a broken pot with a connection to the abolition of slavery, a 19th-century pistol, a collection of vintage hats, a complete set of Famous Five books and a rare jade pendant dug up in the garden of a 17th-century house

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents the second programme this year from RAF Coningsby in Lincolnshire, and discovers the story of a length of tree that ended up inside a Lancaster bomber. Treasures brought in to be valued include a harp that survived the French Revolution, a curious wooden item with an unexpected purpose, a diamond brooch found hidden inside a barometer and a pair of Second World War propaganda posters printed on hessian sacking

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: An impressive collection of five iconic cars arrives at Thornton le Dale, including a 1967 Crayford Corsair and a 1966 Ford Zodiac which emerge from a garage in Selby

programme.title: Russia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: On the 100th anniversary of the Russian Revolution, adventurer Simon Reeve embarks on a journey across the worlds biggest country. He begins in Russias far east, and the snow-capped volcanoes of Kamchatka and Yakutia, where reindeer herders live in temperatures as low as minus 30. Outside the eastern port of Vladivostok, Simon investigates the growing influence of China on the area, then passes through the Boreal Forest, where he meets a conservationist dedicated to protecting the Amur tiger. His final destination is a giant hole in the ground in Siberia

programme.desc: The Royal Highland Fusilier, a 100-ton Deltic diesel engine, must be hauled from Leicestershire to Wirksworth in Cheshire
